message.content:
{"id": "18335", 
"title": "Perspective contents lost when view is maximized", 
"description": "When switching to a different perspective and then exiting the workbench, the contents of the perspective are lost when the view is maximized.", 
"OB": "Currently, when the workbench is closed, the temporary layout is getting persisted instead of the proper layout.", 
"EB": "The expected behavior should be that the proper layout is persisted when the workbench is closed, so that when it is reopened and the perspective with the maximized view is selected, the contents of the perspective are not lost.", 
"SR": "To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:\n1. Switch to another perspective.\n2. Exit the workbench.\n3. Open the workbench.\n4. Switch to the perspective with the maximized view.\nThe perspective contents should not be lost and should be displayed correctly."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18335', 'title': 'Bug 18335Perspective contents lost when view is maximized', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'This temporary layoutmust be getting persisted instead of the proper layout when the workbench isclosed. ', 'SR': 'Switch to another perspective and exit theworkbench. Open the workbench and switch to the perspective with the maximizedview. '}
